title: Wait A Minute, Ram Gopal Varma’s Next Film Is Based On Our Favourite Sasikala - Indiatimes.com
text:
Saloni Singh February 17, 2017 
Bollywood director Ram Gopal Varma who is known for making hard hitting films which eventually turn into hilarious ones, is back YET again. 
Twitter 
Yes, RGV who is best with nasty tweets, is now making a comeback with another controversial subject. This time, it's on none other than Sasikala, the god father. The film will reportedly capture her entire journey and the struggles she has gone through. He took to Twitter to make the big announcement. Truth behind Jayalalitha and Sasikala relationship,what Poes garden servants told me is unimaginably shocking and I wil show it in my film pic.twitter.com/YocWWyiTUQ — Ram Gopal Varma (@RGVzoomin) February 16, 2017 "Sasikala" is going to be the story of the story behind Sasikala in front of Sasikala and only Manargudi mafia members will understand this pic.twitter.com/SvOSQtLPOQ — Ram Gopal Varma (@RGVzoomin) February 16, 2017 With RGV, one can never tell if he’s joking on social media or is really serious because this poster doesn’t come across as a very authentic one. 
However, it’ll be an interesting film because, RGV and Sasikala combined together, will be quite a WATCH. Are you guys excited? Don't Miss
